translation.en: Morning, Ms. Rita, mm-hmm. Morning, Monty.
translation.zh:
-早上好 丽塔女士
-早上好 蒙蒂

translation.en: -Hey, Maya. -Hey, Monty.
translation.zh:
-嗨 玛雅
-嗨 蒙蒂

translation.en: Hey, baby.
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝

translation.en: -What up, Willie? -What's up, young blood?
translation.zh:
-你好吗 威利？
-你好 年轻人

translation.en: -How are you? -Old and tired. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-最近怎么样？
-人老体衰

translation.en: That woman say this engine won't start. Yeah, well, it won't.
translation.zh:
-那位女士说这个发动机无法起动
-是的 它无法起动

translation.en: You know, Monty, he was supposed to fix it.
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 他应该修好这机器的

translation.en: Never did.
translation.zh: 他没修好

translation.en: He don't know what he doing. That fool can't even see.
translation.zh:
他不知道自己在干什么
那个傻瓜甚至看不见

translation.en: I saw your momma the night you were made.
translation.zh: 你被怀上的时候 我看着你妈

translation.en: What'd you say to me? Don't you make me put this baby down.
translation.zh: 你和我说什么？别让我放下孩子

translation.en: That ain't no way to talk to me.
translation.zh: 不应该和我这样说话吧

translation.en: I gave this car service one of its best clients.
translation.zh:
我把最好的客户
提供给这里的汽车服务

translation.en: Yeah, you never let me forget it neither.
translation.zh:
-是啊 你也从不让我忘了这件事
-对极了

translation.en: That's right. Maya, I'll take a look at it for you, baby.
translation.zh:
-玛雅 我现在给你的车子检查
-谢谢

translation.en: -Take a seat. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: You all right? And you better do something, you know Chico quit.
translation.zh: 你还好吧？ 你最好做点什么 你知道奇科辞职了

translation.en: You don't want to lose my boss as a client. Ma'am.
translation.zh: 我的老板将不再是你们的客户

translation.en: Here you go, Willie. [Willie] How much is here?
translation.zh:
-给你
-这里有多少？

translation.en: [Monty] Not enough, but I'll get it to you. I promise. Okay?
translation.zh:
不是很多 不过我肯定给你
我保证 好吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, man, look. I just lost one of my drivers.
translation.zh: 我刚刚失去了一个司机

translation.en: He was the only one classy enough to drive the old corporate types.
translation.zh: 他是唯一长相符合公司司机标准的人

translation.en: -Now, listen to me-- -No, no, no, Willie.
translation.zh:
现在 听我说 不不不 威利
你知道我受不了他们傲慢的态度

translation.en: You know I can't stand them.
translation.zh:
不不不 威利
你知道我受不了他们傲慢的态度

translation.en: Hear me out. The pay is good.
translation.zh:
不不不 威利
你知道我受不了他们傲慢的态度 听我说 有很高的薪水

translation.en: -The stuck-up types. -Oh, come on, now.
translation.zh: 得了吧

translation.en: It would help you make more of a down payment for this place.
translation.zh: 那工作能帮你多付点这地方的订金

translation.en: Man, Willie. You know I'm better under the hood
translation.zh: 威利 你知道

translation.en: than I am behind the wheel, man.
translation.zh: 我修车比开车更在行

translation.en: Do you really want to buy this place?
translation.zh: 你真的想买这地方吗？这就是个开始

translation.en: Now this is a start. The pay is good.
translation.zh: 你真的想买这地方吗？这就是个开始 报酬很高 她是一个好顾客

translation.en: I got you a good client, and she pays well. I don't want to lose her.
translation.zh: 报酬很高 她是一个好顾客 她付很高的价钱 我不想失去这顾客

translation.en: -I'll think about it. -You'll think--what?
translation.zh:
-我会考虑的
-考虑什么？

translation.en: I'll think--what? Watch it, old man.
translation.zh:
-我会考虑的
-什么？ -看着点 老家伙
-你才要看着点

translation.en: You watch it.
translation.zh:
-看着点 老家伙
-你才要看着点

translation.en: Maya, turn the key?
translation.zh: 玛雅 发动一下

translation.en: -[Maya] Thank you, Monty. -All right, baby.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你 蒙蒂
-不客气

translation.en: You know, this should really be your place.
translation.zh: 你知道 这里应该由你来坐

translation.en: Oh, it will be soon, baby. A'ight.
translation.zh: 宝贝 很快就会

translation.en: -Hey, boy. How you been? -What up, Kevin.
translation.zh:
-嘿 你最近怎么样？
-怎么了 凯文？

translation.en: -All right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Oh, man. Oh, man.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Wilbert! Get up!
translation.zh: 威尔伯 起来

translation.en: -Hey, Monty. -Hey, Ms. Rochelle.
translation.zh:
-嗨 蒙蒂
-嗨 罗谢尔夫人

translation.en: You got people stepping all over you!
translation.zh: 别人都得从你身上跨过去了

translation.en: -He at it again? -Get up!
translation.zh:
-起来
-他又犯了？

translation.en: Always. Always.
translation.zh: 总是这样

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Monty!
translation.zh: 嗨 蒙蒂

translation.en: Wilbert! Get up, boy!
translation.zh: 威尔伯 起来

translation.en: [Monty] Is anybody home?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: [coughs] Sierra? [coughing] Get the door.
translation.zh: 西尼娅 去看看是谁？

translation.en: Who is it? [Monty] Who is it? It's your daddy. Open up.
translation.zh:
-是谁？
-是谁？是你们的爸爸 开门

translation.en: Hey, y'all, it's daddy! [both] Daddy!
translation.zh:
-嘿 是爸爸
-爸爸

translation.en: [Monty] Come on, y'all. Hurry up.
translation.zh: 快过来 孩子们

translation.en: Hey. What up, come here, come here, come here.
translation.zh: 怎么了？快过来 过来

translation.en: What's going on? Can I come in?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？我能进来吗？

translation.en: Hey, Ms. Kat.
translation.zh: 嗨 凯瑟琳女士

translation.en: Hey, Daddy, what'd you bring us? Oh, now, is that all I'm good for?
translation.zh:
-爸爸 你给我们带什么了？
-我只会给你们带东西吗？

translation.en: No. -Can I get some love? -[laughter]
translation.zh:
-不 爸爸
-我能得到点爱吗？

translation.en: Daddy, you know I got a "B" on my class project?
translation.zh: 爸爸 我的课程得了Ｂ

translation.en: [Monty] Oh. -Thanks for helping me. -What'd I tell you?
translation.zh:
-谢谢你帮我
-我和你说过什么？

translation.en: Girl's gonna get a good grade. And I did.
translation.zh: 我会考到好成绩 我真的考到了

translation.en: Hey, daddy? Will you take us to the movies this weekend?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你周末会带我们去看电影吗？

translation.en: -No. -[coughs]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll take you out to the movies.
translation.zh: 我带你们去看电影

translation.en: You know, Saturday is daddy-daughter day so.
translation.zh: 你知道 周六是父女日

translation.en: Okay. So, Daddy, what did you bring us? Just some food, baby.
translation.zh:
-太好了 爸爸 你给我们带什么了？
-宝贝 只是些吃的

translation.en: -Dad... -That always comes in handy.
translation.zh: 那总是能派上用场

translation.en: You girls go in the room, let me talk to your daddy.
translation.zh: 女孩们进房间去 我要和你们爸爸谈谈 是的 进房间去 别让我进得去啊

translation.en: Get in there. Don't make me come in there.
translation.zh: 是的 进房间去 别让我进得去啊

translation.en: What y'all doing, playing checkers? Huh?
translation.zh: 你们准备玩什么？跳棋吗？

translation.en: You're always playing something.
translation.zh: 你们应该玩点什么

translation.en: Here, Ms. Kat, I got 200 this week.
translation.zh: 谢谢 凯瑟琳 200美元 这一周的

translation.en: I'll owe the rest to you.
translation.zh: 我会把剩下的给你

translation.en: You know, Ms. Kat, you know you gotta take care of that cough.
translation.zh: 凯特女人 你要去看看你的咳嗽了

translation.en: I mean, it sounds like it's getting worse every time I come up in here.
translation.zh:
我是说 我每次来的时候
你的情况都比上次更糟

translation.en: [sniffs] Yeah.
translation.zh:
我是说 我每次来的时候
你的情况都比上次更糟 是的

translation.en: Jenny been by? That daughter of mine?
translation.zh:
-珍妮来过吗？
-我的那个女儿？

translation.en: No. Only time I see her is when she's driving by.
translation.zh: 没有 我只看到一次她开车经过

translation.en: She ain't been here to see these girls in months.
translation.zh: 她几个月没来看孩子们了

translation.en: So happy you're here, or they wouldn't know they had a daddy or a momma.
translation.zh:
很高兴你来了
不然孩子们会以为自己无父无母

translation.en: Monty?
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 听着

translation.en: You sit back. Sit down.
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 听着 坐下

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: I need you to go down to family court with me right away,
translation.zh: 我要你立即和我去家事法庭

translation.en: so you can tell them that you're taking the girls.
translation.zh: 这样你就可以拿到孩子们的抚养权

translation.en: I need you to raise them.
translation.zh: 我要你来抚养她们

translation.en: Ms. Kat, you know I love my kids, but I can't take them full-time--
translation.zh:
凯特女士 我知道你爱我的孩子们
但我不能全天照顾她们

translation.en: Then they gonna have to stay with their mom.
translation.zh:
那样她们就要
和她们的妈妈一起生活了

translation.en: -Now, you know I don't want that. -Neither do I.
translation.zh:
-你知道我不想那样
-我也不想

translation.en: Especially since she's living with that Joe, the biggest drug dealer in the area.
translation.zh:
尤其是珍妮
和这区最大的毒犯子乔在一起

translation.en: Sitting up there in that window, staring down at all of us like he's God.
translation.zh: 他坐在窗户边 像上帝一样看着我们

translation.en: And she's right there with him.
translation.zh: 珍妮就和他在一起

translation.en: She don't care about nobody but herself.
translation.zh: 她除了自己谁也不关心

translation.en: Do you know what'll happen to them girls if they have to live with their momma? Huh?
translation.zh:
你知道如果孩子们和妈妈一起生活
会发生什么吗？

translation.en: God forbid.
translation.zh: 上帝原谅我

translation.en: -Monty, please. -Ms. Kat, I--I--
translation.zh:
-蒙蒂 拜托
-凯特女士 我…

translation.en: I have lung cancer.
translation.zh: 我得了肺癌

translation.en: I am dying, Monty.
translation.zh: 我要死了 蒙蒂

translation.en: I've been hanging in here for them girls as long as I can, but I'm dying.
translation.zh:
我已经照顾这些孩子们很久了
我累了

translation.en: I'm dying.
translation.zh: 我累了

translation.en: Why didn't you say something? Why didn't you tell me this?
translation.zh: 你为什么以前不告诉我？

translation.en: Ms. Kat, it's gonna be all right.
translation.zh: 凯特女士 一切都会好的

translation.en: It is not gonna be all right.
translation.zh: 不可能了

translation.en: Why didn't y'all call me?
translation.zh: 你为什不告诉我

translation.en: Mommy!
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-别看她

translation.en: Wait, where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: 不 等等 你们要去哪？

translation.en: These are my kids. Stop. Stop. Get out of here!
translation.zh: 这是我的孩子 停 上车 孩子们

translation.en: Get in the car, baby. Stop. Quit it! No, you get off of me!
translation.zh:
-停 放手
-不 你放开我

translation.en: Stop it, Jenny! Stop it. For real.
translation.zh: 珍妮 停手

translation.en: Everything all right, baby? No, you get my kids out of this car!
translation.zh:
-一切都好吗？
-让我的孩子从车上下来

translation.en: Jenny, stop, stop!
translation.zh: 够了 珍妮

translation.en: You have not been to see these kids in months.
translation.zh: 你已经几个月没来看过孩子们了

translation.en: You want to come take them now? Huh?
translation.zh:
-你现在想带她们走？
-把你的手拿开

translation.en: You gotta be crazy. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 你疯了 滚开

translation.en: Nah, you need to back up, son. Yo, do me a favor, shut up.
translation.zh:
-你要道歉
-帮个忙 你闭上嘴

translation.en: Stop it! Stop it, stop it!
translation.zh:
-帮个忙败类 闭嘴
-停下来

translation.en: Go ahead, baby. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 宝贝 把你们的安全带系好 没事

translation.en: This is your mother's funeral, and you know she wanted these girls to go with him.
translation.zh: 这是你妈妈的葬礼 你知道她想让孩子们和他一起生活

translation.en: Jennifer, you know it.
translation.zh: 珍妮 你知道的

translation.en: You out whoring around with these thugs.
translation.zh: 你和这个小混混在一起

translation.en: She didn't want these girls around all of this foolishness.
translation.zh: 她不想让孩子们和这些傻瓜在一起

translation.en: Let me tell you something, Aunt Rita.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你 丽塔婶婶

translation.en: All right, these are my kids! Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 这是我的孩子 你听到了吗？

translation.en: You ain't just gonna take 'em from me!
translation.zh: 你不能把她们从我身边带走

translation.en: And let me tell you, go make your mechanic money.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你 做你的修理工赚钱去吧

translation.en: You save it, 'cause we're going to court, you hear me?
translation.zh:
钱都攒起来 因为我们要打官司了
你听明白了吗？

translation.en: Give me my kids back. You're gonna give them back to me.
translation.zh:
把我的孩子还回来
你要把她们还给我

translation.en: You stay outta my way!
translation.zh: 别挡我的路

translation.en: What are you doing? Think you gonna let my momma die?
translation.zh:
-你在干什么？
-我在想你怎么会让我妈妈死

translation.en: Huh? You gonna let them bury my momma, and you don't tell me, Willie?
translation.zh:
冷静 威尔伯 你让他们把我的妈妈葬了
却不告诉我

translation.en: [man] You should've been there for your momma.
translation.zh:
-你应该来看看你妈妈
-是的

translation.en: [Jenny] You know it ain't right. [woman] Too late now.
translation.zh:
-你知道那不对
-现在一切都太晚了

translation.en: [Sierra] Daddy, you know this place is too small for all of us.
translation.zh:
爸爸 你知道这地方
对我们三个人来说太小了

translation.en: [Lauryn] Well, we don't have anywhere else to go. [China] we can go live with momma.
translation.zh: 我们没有别的地方能去

translation.en: China, momma don't want us. She never did.
translation.zh: 洽娜 妈妈从没想过要我们

translation.en: -That's not true. -It is true.
translation.zh:
-那不是真的
-是真的

translation.en: -Is that true, daddy? -I'll tell you what is true.
translation.zh:
-爸爸 是真的吗？
-让我来告诉你们什么是真的

translation.en: I want y'all to come stay with me. Hmm?
translation.zh: 我只想和你们在一起生活

translation.en: Where we gonna sleep?
translation.zh: 那我们睡哪？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna sleep on the couch,
translation.zh: 我睡沙发 你们

translation.en: and you guys, I mean girls,
translation.zh: 我睡沙发 你们 我是说 女孩子们睡床

translation.en: are going to sleep in the bedroom.
translation.zh: 我是说 女孩子们睡床

translation.en: I fixed it up.
translation.zh: 我已经整修过了

translation.en: How bad was it before?
translation.zh: 之前有多糟？

translation.en: Daddy? China pees in the bed.
translation.zh: 爸爸 洽娜会尿床

translation.en: And I ain't sleeping with her.
translation.zh: 我不和她睡一起

translation.en: I do not! Why you gotta put all my business out like that? What's wrong with you?
translation.zh:
我也不 为什么我要忍受这样的侮蔑？ -你们有什么毛病？
-随便你

translation.en: Whatever. We need some separate beds
translation.zh:
-你们有什么毛病？
-随便你 我们需要几张单独的床或床铺
或是别的什么

translation.en: or some bunk beds or something, 'cause this ain't gonna work.
translation.zh:
我们需要几张单独的床或床铺
或是别的什么 -因为这没用
-我会尽力的 好吗？

translation.en: Well, I'll work on it, okay?
translation.zh:
-因为这没用
-我会尽力的 好吗？

translation.en: Well, while you work on it, how about feeding us
translation.zh: 那在你尽力的时候 给我们吃什么？

translation.en: and getting all three of us some food? 'Cause all three of us are hungry.
translation.zh: 能给我们拿点吃的吗？我们都饿了

translation.en: You know what? You got a mouth like your momma.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你的嘴和你妈妈的一样

translation.en: You need to put your clothes in them drawers right here, thank you.
translation.zh:
去把你们的衣服
放到那个抽屉里 谢谢

translation.en: I like this bedroom.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个卧室

translation.en: Lord, how am I going to do this?
translation.zh: 上帝 我怎么办？

translation.en: Man, I can't believe I'm doing this.
translation.zh: 我无法自己会这么做

translation.en: You waiting for Ms. Rossmore?
translation.zh: 你在等萝斯米尔女士吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Rossmore. Julia rossmore.
translation.zh: 是的 萝斯米尔 茱丽叶·萝斯米尔

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: -[chuckling] -What you mean, "Good luck"?
translation.zh: 你说“祝你好运”什么意思？

translation.en: -Good day, Ms. Rossmore. -Good morning.
translation.zh:
-你好 萝斯米尔女士
-早上好

translation.en: You gonna open the door? Uh, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
-你能把车门打开吗？
-是的

translation.en: -Can you close the door? -Oh, yeah. Oh.
translation.zh:
-你能把车门关上吗？
-好的

translation.en: -[laughs] -What you laughing at?
translation.zh: 你笑什么？

translation.en: [Julia] Tell him to meet me there. Tell him to wait, then.
translation.zh: 让他在那里和我见面 让他等一会

translation.en: I'm surprised the jury's returned so soon myself.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶 陪审团这么快就回来了

translation.en: That's a great thing. Yeah, definitely. All right, see you in a second.
translation.zh: 不 这是件好事 好 一会见

translation.en: Did they tell you I need you to be on call?
translation.zh: 他们告诉人你要随时待命吗？

translation.en: Oh, you talking to me? You're the only other person in the car.
translation.zh:
-你是在和我说话吗？
-车里除了我 就只有你了

translation.en: Oh, no, you know what, I thought you were still on the phone, you know.
translation.zh: 我以为你还在讲电话呢

translation.en: Well, basically all I need you to do is get me to the office and get me to court. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
基本上
你只需要送我去办公室和法庭

translation.en: Sometimes I work late, and sometimes I entertain clients after work,
translation.zh:
有时候我工作到很晚 有时候下班后我应酬客户
这一类的事情

translation.en: that sort of thing.
translation.zh:
有时候下班后我应酬客户
这一类的事情

translation.en: You know what, Ms. Rossmore? Right now, I need all the overtime I can get.
translation.zh:
知道吗 萝斯米尔女士？
我现在需要所有能获得的空闲时间

translation.en: I'm sorry, what's your name?
translation.zh:
-抱歉 你叫什么名字？
-蒙蒂

translation.en: Look, I don't like to fraternize, so let's keep this strictly professional, okay?
translation.zh:
蒙蒂 我不想和你有更深的交往
我们就保持这种工作关系好吗？

translation.en: -Yes, ma'am. -Fabulous.
translation.zh:
-是的 女士
-很好

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I'm sorry about that.
translation.zh: 我感到很抱歉

translation.en: Are you-- am I getting punk'd?
translation.zh: 你是不是想让我听朋客音乐？

translation.en: No, you're not getting punk'd, ma'am.
translation.zh: 我没有想让你听

translation.en: I just, you know, thought you might want the radio--
translation.zh: 我只是认为你可能想把收音机打开

translation.en: -No, I like silence. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
-不 我喜欢安静

发生了什么事？

-女士

抱歉 我是蒙蒂·詹姆斯
我的孩子在这里吗？

-是的 我在听
-她们在这里吗？

-您请坐 先生
-她们在哪？

translation.en: Excuse me, excuse me. Where are they?

translation.en: Have a seat, sir.

他把钥匙拿走了吗？

translation.en: -[honking] -Fabulous.

我要打电话…我能打给谁？
我的电池没电了 好极了

translation.en: No. No. Julia, no. You're in control,

translation.en: here, and...

送我回家 蒙蒂

translation.en: Take me home, Brother.

translation.en: Yes.

translation.en: Hey. Look, I try to support black-owned businesses,

translation.en: but this is absolutely ridiculous. Take me home now.

translation.en: Monty, Ms. Rossmore--
translation.zh:
蒙蒂 -萝斯米尔女士
-玛雅你怎么在这里？

-萝斯米尔女士
-玛雅你怎么在这里？

今晚以后他就不再是我的司机了

-玛雅发生的什么事？
-你家里着火了

-劳里·贝尔 社会服务局
-我的孩子们好吗？她们现在在哪？

她们很好 有人照顾她们
詹姆斯先生 这是件很严重的事

translation.en: I know, I know. I had to work tonight,

translation.en: and, um, the oldest one,

translation.en: she's old enough to look after the little ones--

translation.en: And I live right next door.
translation.zh:
-我就住在他隔壁
-这是我的邻居

translation.en: This is my neighbor here-- Well, your daughter started a fire.

translation.en: Now, I'm sure it was an accident.
translation.zh:
现在我确认
这是个意外 火势也不严重

translation.en: The fire wasn't that bad, but if your neighbor had not broken down the door,

现在我确认
这是个意外 火势也不严重 但是如果你的邻居没把门撞开

translation.en: your daughters could've died of smoke inhalation.

translation.en: Now we're gonna have to look after your daughters for a little while.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, this is a mistake--

translation.en: It's a mistake that could've gotten them killed, Mr. James.

translation.en: Now, you can call about visitation,

translation.en: but for now, they're in custody of their mother.

但是现在
她们将会和她们的妈妈一起

translation.en: No, ma'am, no, no.

translation.en: No. Uh, let me talk to the little one, please?

translation.en: -Look, all right-- -Mr. James-- Mr. James, I'm sorry.

-詹姆斯先生 我很抱歉
-好吧 好吧

-把我的孩子带来
-杰克逊女士

translation.en: Hold on, hold on--

translation.en: And my mother had the nerve to think that you would do a better job than me.

translation.en: So I guess this right here is a better job?

translation.en: Almost killing my kids?

-差点杀了我的孩子
-去把她们带来

translation.en: -Just go get little China-- -No, go get nothin'.
translation.zh: 不 我不会带来她们

translation.en: You know we gonna get custody now, right?

-我将会很乐意来照顾你女儿
-蒙蒂！

translation.zh:
-蒙蒂 你想和我动手吗？
-给我个理由！

translation.en: -You want to start something, Monty? -Monty!
translation.zh:
-蒙蒂 你想和我动手吗？
-蒙蒂！

translation.en: You picked the wrong person to mess with.

translation.en: All right. Let me get my kids, man, just let me get my kids, man.

translation.zh:
你完了 -你说什么？
-蒙蒂

translation.en: Monty.
translation.zh:
-你说什么？
-蒙蒂

translation.en: Is he gonna take me home?

translation.en: How old are your girls?

translation.en: Five, seven, and twelve.
translation.zh: 5岁、7岁和12岁

translation.en: I'm sorry.

-你知道什么时候开庭吗？
-七天以后开始听审

他们都说同样的事
他们需要更多的钱和时间

translation.en: they got long money.

你需要得到上帝的帮助
并且还得有两个白人来帮你

因此我今天的任务
就是用保罗的话来鼓励你

translation.en: He says, "And let us not grow weary in well-doing."
translation.zh: 他说：“不要厌倦做好事”

translation.en: He said, "For in due season, you shall reap if you faint not."
translation.zh: 他说：“收获的季节 就应该收获”

translation.en: Now, what I'm trying to tell you... ...is that God is faithful.

translation.en: And in His faithfulness,
translation.zh:
在他的信仰中
他提醒我们在做好事的同时

translation.en: he reminds us that in doing good, you shall get weary.
translation.zh:
在他的信仰中
他提醒我们在做好事的同时 你也会感到疲倦

translation.en: There's no sin in getting weary, the sin is giving up,

translation.en: because I'm here to announce to you,
translation.zh: 因为我是要告诉你这件事的

translation.en: you're so close to your due season,

收获的季节已要到了
你很快就会品尝到收获的喜悦

收获的季节已要到了
你很快就会品尝到收获的喜悦 在你的生命中将会出现上帝的指示

translation.en: ...in your life, and it's not time to throw in the towel.

translation.en: It's time to lift up your head, because something's about to happen in your life,

现在要抬起头 因为在你的生命中
有些重要的事情要发生

translation.en: and God's gonna ensure it.

translation.en: The evidence that you're so close to your breakthrough,

translation.en: the evidence that you're so close to your payday

translation.en: and your reward for walking righteous

translation.en: is that you will feel like, you better hear this

translation.en: -I'm telling you something... -[cheering]

translation.en: ...you will feel like you're about to faint.

translation.en: And when you feel like you're about to faint, don't faint.

translation.en: Because that says that I'm right there next to my miracle.

translation.en: I'm right there, right at the door of my due season.
translation.zh: 我就在收获之门口

translation.en: I'm talking to those that walked into this church today

translation.en: with their head kind of hung down,

translation.en: and just about to give up and about to lose your faith.

translation.en: I'm encouraging you, keep the faith!
translation.zh: 我在鼓励你们 保持信仰

translation.en: Stay right there. Don't faint. Hold on.

translation.en: God is about to bring your due season!

translation.en: And you need to give Him praise, you need to bless His name,

translation.en: you need to tell him, I'm still holding on.
translation.zh: 你要告诉祂：“我仍在坚持”

translation.en: God bless you, God bless you, and god bless you.

translation.en: You know how you working my man's nerve with that whining?

translation.en: You think I'm gonna let you come in between
translation.zh:
你以为你哭
就能搅乱我和男朋友的关系

translation.en: me and my man with all that mess? You gonna stop that.
translation.zh:
你以为你哭
就能搅乱我和男朋友的关系 别再哭了

-我要爸爸
-你不能再回到你爸爸身边了

translation.en: -Why? -Because I said so, that's why.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-因为那是我说的

translation.en: You gonna stay right here with me.
translation.zh: 你就在这 和我住在一起

translation.en: And you're goin'. China, you gonna stop that whining.

translation.en: China, get in there, get in there.
translation.zh: 洽娜 你别再哭了 洽娜 进房间去

translation.en: You gonna stay here with me, you ain't going back to your daddy.
translation.zh:
你只能和我住在一起
不能回你爸爸那里

translation.en: Now you get in there until you figure that out. -[China screams] -Get in there.
translation.zh:
现在 你到房间里去
直到你想明白为止

translation.en: Lauryn, go in there with her. Go talk to your sister.
translation.zh: 劳伦 你也去 和你妹妹谈谈

translation.en: I gotta tell you something, now, y'all better be glad I know Jesus.

translation.en: [sighs] Y'all get on my nerves.
translation.zh: 你们给我添了多少麻烦

translation.en: ...really good. I'm over here.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: Mm-hmm, selling drugs right out here in front of this holy place.

translation.en: [Maya] Oh, my goodness. You know what? They need to be stopped.

translation.en: Janis' son got caught selling in school, and said he got it from him.
translation.zh:
贾尼斯的儿子在学校卖毒品被抓了
他说就是从他们那拿的

translation.en: He comes to school and recruits the kids, babies, Monty. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
他在学校雇用学生
那是小孩子啊 蒙蒂

translation.en: And then he sends them to go sell.
translation.zh: 并且让学生卖毒品

translation.en: You know, Monty, you really need to come to this community meeting.
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 你应该参加这样的社区会议

translation.en: Monty, a lot of people respect you in this neighborhood,
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 在这个地区很多人尊敬你

translation.en: and they still remember. Hmm.
translation.zh: 他们仍然记得

translation.en: -You should come to one of the meetings. -I know.
translation.zh:
-你应该参加会议
-我知道

translation.en: I'm praying for you, and for you to get your girls back.
translation.zh:
我会为你祈祷
祈祷你的孩子们能回来

translation.en: -I'll baby-sit anytime, okay? -Oh, I'll baby-sit, too.
translation.zh:
-我会随时照顾她们
-我也一样

translation.en: Honey, the devil never wins, unless you don't fight.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 邪不胜正 除非你不反抗

translation.en: Yeah. You're right. All right, well, I'll see you all later.
translation.zh:
你说得对 -好 再见
-好

translation.en: Okay, baby.
translation.zh:
-好 再见
-好

translation.en: Oh, I'm going back in for a piece of cake.
translation.zh: 我得回去吃点蛋糕

translation.en: Now, you know, baby, you're old enough to understand some things, okay.
translation.zh:
宝贝 你已经长大了
有些事情你要了解

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: Now, you ain't gonna just be sitting around here living off of me.
translation.zh: 现在 你不能无所事事靠我来养活你

translation.en: You got that?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: Hey, look at me while I'm talking to you.
translation.zh: 嘿 在我和你说话的时候 看着我

translation.en: Look at me while I'm talking to you, I said.
translation.zh: 在我和你说话的时候 看着我

translation.en: Don't you dare not look at me.
translation.zh: 你再敢不看着我试试

translation.en: It's time for you to start your own hustle.
translation.zh:
-顼在你要自己赚钱了
-不

translation.en: -No, no, no. No. -What do you mean, "no"?
translation.zh:
-顼在你要自己赚钱了
-不 你说不是什么意思？

translation.en: -Are you telling me-- -I'm not a hustler.
translation.zh:
-你是想告诉我…
-我不要去卖毒品

translation.en: No, you--you-- You gonna be whatever I tell you gonna be.
translation.zh: 不 我说什么 你就要做什么

translation.en: I'm trying to teach you how never to be broke another day in your life.
translation.zh: 我在教你生活的法则

translation.en: The number one rule to the game
translation.zh: 最重要的法则

translation.en: is never get caught.
translation.zh: 就是永远不要被抓到

translation.en: You got that?
translation.zh: 你明白了吗？

translation.en: Now, I'm about to go get a drink.
translation.zh: 现在 我要喝一杯了

translation.en: You want one?
translation.zh: 你要不要来一杯？

translation.en: Willie's garage. Can I help you?
translation.zh: 威利车房 有什么能帮你的？

translation.en: Hold on. Monty, telephone.
translation.zh:
-等一下 蒙蒂 电话
-好的

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: We called her mother, but no one answered.
translation.zh:
我们给她妈妈打电话了
但是没有人接

translation.en: This kind of thing is frowned upon, Mr. James.
translation.zh: 这样的东西是被禁止的 詹姆斯先生

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的先生

translation.en: C.C., where'd you get this from? Huh?

translation.en: Go ahead and answer me. Joe.
translation.zh:
-别怕 告诉我们
-乔

translation.en: -Joe gave you this? -Who is Joe?
translation.zh:
乔给你了这个？ -乔是谁？
-是她妈妈的男朋友

translation.en: Joe is, uh, her mother's boyfriend.
translation.zh:
-乔是谁？
-是她妈妈的男朋友

translation.en: What is wrong with you, C.C.?
translation.zh: 西西 你怎么回事？

translation.en: -Huh? Did you lose your mind? -I don't want you to die.
translation.zh:
-你昏了头了吗？
-我不想你死

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: He said if I didn't do it, he was gonna get one of his boys to take you out.
translation.zh:
他说如果我不做

-是的 爸爸
-什么？

translation.en: Sir, I didn't do anything. -Shut up! -I didn't do anything.
translation.zh:
-先生 我什么都没做
-闭嘴

-我什么也没做 是她的主意
-闭嘴 大明星

-告诉他 我什么也没做
-报警

-报警 告诉他 阿曼达
如果你不说实话 我就要坐牢了

告诉他 阿曼达
如果你不说实话 我就要坐牢了 -告诉他真相
-你的好日子到头了

translation.en: Your ball days are over! You got me?

-告诉他真相
-你的好日子到头了

translation.en: -I didn't do nothing! -Shut up right now!
translation.zh:
-你听明白了吗？
-我什么都没干 -闭嘴！
-我什么都没干

translation.zh:
拿开你的手
我看见你都恶心

translation.en: You're a rapist! [echoing] You're a rapist! You're a rapist!

translation.en: [Jennifer] I bet you he won't ever take our money again.

translation.en: [Joe] I know that's right. You gotta keep 'em straight, J.

translation.en: You know I got your back, right, baby?

translation.en: That's why you my girl.

translation.en: You know, I want to go see that movie with the dude with the ax,
translation.zh:
我说 我想去看那部电影
有个带斧子的家伙

translation.en: no, no, no, it's the chainsaw.

translation.en: Baby, you know, if we went to see that movie--

translation.en: Check it out.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧怎么了

translation.en: Oh, snap! Load up! Load up!

translation.en: Do something!

translation.en: [newscaster] Tthere was a near-riot today in the Edgewood community.
translation.zh: 在埃奇伍德区有一场骚乱

translation.en: Police officers were called in to break up a fight
translation.zh:
当地帮派成员
和不堪忍受的居民之间发生了冲突

translation.en: between local gang members and residents who had had enough.
translation.zh: 警察到来制止这场斗殴

translation.en: Among those arrested was Monty James.
translation.zh: 被拘留的人包括蒙蒂·詹姆斯

translation.en: You may remember Monty James, a high school basketball star
translation.zh:
您可能还记得蒙蒂·詹姆斯
他是高中的篮球明星

translation.en: who was falsely convicted in 1990
translation.zh:
1990年 他因涉嫌在非双方自愿的情况下
与一名17岁的少女发生关系

translation.en: for allegedly having non-consensual sex with a 17-year-old girl--
translation.zh: 而遭到误判

translation.en: I'm assuming you have admissible evidence this time?
translation.zh: 我想这次你有合理可取的证据了

translation.en: Yes, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 是的 法官大人

translation.en: The police seized several pounds
translation.zh: 警察从被告的汽车里

translation.en: of marijuana hidden in the defendant's vehicle.
translation.zh: 警察从被告的汽车里 找出了藏好的数磅大麻

translation.en: A subsequent search of the residence
translation.zh: 之后对被告住宅的搜查

translation.en: turned up several kilograms of crack cocaine.
translation.zh: 又发现了数公斤高纯度的可卡因

translation.en: This time, Your Honor, we have a valid warrant.
translation.zh:
这一次 法官大人
我们有正当的搜捕证

translation.en: Your Honor, even though they served the search warrant, they still have no witnesses.
translation.zh: 法官大人 即使他们提供了搜索证 但他们还是没有目击证人

translation.en: Your Honor, I'll testify.
translation.zh: 法官大人 我可以作证

translation.en: Congratulations! It looks like you have a case.
translation.zh: 恭喜 看起来你们赢了

translation.en: Take them into custody. There will be no bond.
translation.zh: 把他们羁押起来 不得保释

translation.en: -Next case. -Wait, get your hand off me!
translation.zh:
-下一个案子
-等等 拿开你的手

translation.en: [bailiff] The state of Georgia versus Monty James.
translation.zh: 乔治亚州诉蒙蒂·詹姆斯

translation.en: Order! Order in this court! All of you, be quiet! Or I'll have you removed!
translation.zh:
秩序 保持法庭秩序
各位 肃静 否则请你们离席

translation.en: I will have order!
translation.zh: 保持秩序

translation.en: Order!
translation.zh: 秩序

translation.en: Order!
translation.zh: 秩序

translation.en: I said order!
translation.zh: 我说保持秩序

translation.en: Who's here for the defense? I am, Your Honor.
translation.zh:
-谁是辩护律师？
-是我 法官大人

translation.en: Ms. Rossmore?
translation.zh: 萝丝摩尔小姐

translation.en: May I take a second, please?
translation.zh: 我能占用几分钟吗？

translation.en: What you doing here? I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你来这做什么？

translation.en: I didn't give you a chance to explain, and if you don't ever want to speak to me again,
translation.zh:
对不起 我没给机会你解释 如果你不想再和我说话
我完全可以理解

translation.en: I completely understand.
translation.zh:
如果你不想再和我说话
我完全可以理解

translation.en: Let me help you.
translation.zh: 让我来帮你

translation.en: Monty, just let me help you.
translation.zh: 蒙蒂 就让我来帮你

translation.en: Just get me back to my kids.
translation.zh: 我只要我的孩子们回来

translation.en: Ms. Rossmore?
translation.zh: 萝丝摩尔小姐？

translation.en: Your Honor, there's no evidence my client committed any criminal act.
translation.zh:
法官大人 没有证据表明
我的当事人犯了任何罪行

translation.en: The state has no case against him.
translation.zh: 乔治亚州不能起诉他

translation.en: We demand a preliminary hearing
translation.zh: 我们要求成立调查庭

translation.en: and request the state be required to show probable cause.
translation.zh:
并请求要求乔治亚州
出示起诉的可能事由

translation.en: Your Honor, I'm sure that one of these witnesses
translation.zh:
法官大人
我敢肯定这些目击者可以作证

translation.en: can attest to the fact that Mr. James
translation.zh:
法官大人
我敢肯定这些目击者可以作证 詹姆斯先生开车撞上
前一位被告的汽车

translation.en: drove his vehicle into the previous defendant's vehicle.
translation.zh:
詹姆斯先生开车撞上
前一位被告的汽车

translation.en: It was an accident.
translation.zh: 完全是一桩意外

translation.en: I'm sure that the subsequent fistfight was an accident also then, counselor.
translation.zh:
辩方律师 我肯定后来的互殴
也是一桩意外咯

translation.en: Where are the witnesses?
translation.zh: 目击者在哪？

translation.en: Your Honor, the entire neighborhood saw this.
translation.zh: 法官大人 附近的街坊们都看见了

translation.en: I'm sure we have a witness.
translation.zh: 我们一定有目击者

translation.en: May I have one of the witnesses. Please stand at this time?
translation.zh: 请问哪位目击者可以站起来？

translation.en: -Your Honor-- -I'm dismissing the case.
translation.zh:
-法官大人…
-我驳回这个案件

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: And I'm sorry for everything.
translation.zh: 关于这一切 我很对不起

translation.en: [Monty] Oh, man! Forget about it!
translation.zh: 老兄 来 我真不敢相信

translation.en: I can't believe this! Yo! The whole neighborhood!
translation.zh: 老兄 来 我真不敢相信 整个小区都会记住的

translation.en: [alll] Daddy!
translation.zh:
整个小区都会记住的 -爸爸
-爸爸

translation.en: Come here, baby.
translation.zh: 来这 宝贝

translation.en: -It's all you now, boy. -I love you, man. I appreciate it.
translation.zh:
-这都是你的了 孩子
-我爱你 老兄 谢谢

translation.en: Bye, babies.
translation.zh: 再见
